champ_0040_rival_02:
It’s so wild that we ended up randomly visiting
the same Gym at the same time—again!\c
What a weird coincidence...[npcn:4]
champ_0040_rival_03:
I swear I’m not just sneaking ahead of you so I
can lie in wait and go, “Oh wow, weird, might\r
as well battle now that you’re here!”[npcn:4]
champ_0040_rival_04:
No, seriously! Look, to prove it, I won’t even
challenge you to a battle this time!\r
Much as I’d like to...[npcn:4]
champ_0040_rival_05:
But look at you and your Pokémon! [It’s;They’ve:n]
definitely gotten stronger since last time![npcn:4]
champ_0040_rival_06:
Add these to the mix, and you’ll be 100 percent
set to go, no problem![npcn:4]
champ_0040_rival_07:
I’ll be cheering for ya! I’ll go train, like, maybe
20 Pokémon or so while you tackle the Gym![npcn:4]
